SELECT tpr.id, tpr.seriesNo, tpr.roundNo, tpr.atmosphere, tpr.site, tpr.firstLocation, tpr.remark, tpr.isManualSaved, tpc.title, tpc.content, tprrm.roleIds, tprpm.propIds FROM tab_play_round tpr LEFT JOIN tab_play_content tpc ON tpc.round_id = tpr.id
-- 角色信息 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT round_id, GROUP_CONCAT(play_roleid) roleIds FROM tab_play_round_role_map WHERE project_id = #{projectId} GROUP BY round_id ) tprrm ON tprrm.round_id = tpr.id
-- 道具信息 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT trm.round_id, GROUP_CONCAT(trm.prop_id) propIds FROM tab_play_round_prop_map trm, tab_prop tp WHERE trm.prop_id = tp.id AND tp.project_id = #{projectId} GROUP BY round_id ) tprpm ON tprpm.round_id = tpr.id WHERE tpr.project_id = #{projectId} ORDER BY tpr.seriesno, abs(tpr.roundno), tpr.roundno

SELECT count(tpr.id) totalCount, sum(IF(LOCATE('外', tpr.site) != 0, 1, 0)) outCount, sum(IF(LOCATE('外', tpr.site) != 0, 0, 1)) innerCount FROM tab_play_round tpr
-- 角色信息 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT round_id, GROUP_CONCAT(play_roleid) roleIds FROM tab_play_round_role_map WHERE project_id = #{projectId} GROUP BY round_id ) tprrm ON tprrm.round_id = tpr.id
-- 道具信息 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT trm.round_id, GROUP_CONCAT(trm.prop_id) propIds FROM tab_play_round_prop_map trm, tab_prop tp WHERE trm.prop_id = tp.id AND tp.project_id = #{projectId} GROUP BY round_id ) tprpm ON tprpm.round_id = tpr.id WHERE tpr.project_id = #{projectId}
AND tpr.seriesno IN
#{series}
AND tprrm.roleIds like '%${roleId}%'
AND tprpm.propIds like '%${propId}%'
ORDER BY tpr.seriesno, abs(tpr.roundno), tpr.roundno
